methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a list of Blocks with addresses and response codes

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: Retrieve timestamp of the Block records in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

parameters.Name: days
parameters.Description: Number of days in the past for which to retrieve blocks (includes today). Must be an integer greater than 0

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start date of the range to look up statistics. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be before the end_date parameter

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end date of the range to look up statistics. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be after the start_date parameter

methods.Synopsis: Delete an address from the Block list
Retrieve a list of bounces with addresses and response codes, optionally with dates

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: Retrieve timestamp of the bounce records in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

parameters.Name: days
parameters.Description: Number of days in the past for which to retrieve bounces (includes today). Must be an integer greater than 0

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start date of the range for which to retrieve bounces. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be before the end_date parameter

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end date of the range to retrieve bounces. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be after the start_date parameter

methods.Synopsis: Delete an address from the bounce list

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a list of invalid emails with addresses and response codes, optionally with dates

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: Retrieve timestamp of the invalid email records in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

parameters.Name: days
parameters.Description: Number of days in the past for which to retrieve invalid emails (includes today). Must be an integer greater than 0

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start date of the range for which to retrieve invalid emails. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be before the end_date parameter

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end date of the range for which to retrieve invalid emails. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be after the start_date parameter

methods.Synopsis: Delete an address from the invalid email list
Sends a message to one recipient

parameters.Name: x-smtpapi
parameters.Description: Must be valid JSON. Please review SMPT API documentation on what you can do with the JSON headers

parameters.Name: html
parameters.Description: HTML Body of the email. At least one of the text or html parameters must be specified.

parameters.Name: bcc
parameters.Description: Valid email address to be BCC'd. This can also be passed in as an array of email addresses for multiple recipients

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: Specify the date header of your email. Must be a valid RFC 2822 formatted date

parameters.Name: headers
parameters.Description: A collection of key/value pairs in JSON format. Each key represents a header name and the value the header value. Ex: {“X-Accept-Language”: “en”, “X-Mailer”: “MyApp”}

parameters.Name: files
parameters.Description: Add attachment. Ex: files[file1.doc]=example.doc&files[file2.pdf]=example.pdf. Must be less than 7MB.

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve the settings already configured for parsing incoming email
Specify the hostname and url for parsing incoming emails

parameters.Name: url
parameters.Description: URL that parsed emails will be POSTed to

methods.Synopsis: Delete the existing settings for parsing incoming emails
Retrieve user profile information
Update user profile information

parameters.Name: zip
parameters.Description: Postal code where your company is located

methods.Synopsis: Reset password

parameters.Name: confirm_password
parameters.Description: Password confirmation. Must match new password

methods.Synopsis: Updates username used to login to SMTP server and the website. Changes will take effect immediately

parameters.Name: username
parameters.Description: New username. Must not exceed 100 characters

methods.Synopsis: Updates contact email. We send a confirmation to the new email address in order to be validated. Your email address changes when you click on the confirmation link

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: New email. Must be in email format and no more than 100 characters

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a list of spam reports with addresses and response codes, optionally with dates

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: Retrieve timestamp of the spam report records in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

parameters.Name: days
parameters.Description: Number of days in the past for which to retrieve spam reports (includes today). Must be an integer greater than 0

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start date of the range for which to retrieve spam reports. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be before the end_date parameter

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end date of the range for which to retrieve spam reports. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be after the start_date parameter

methods.Synopsis: Delete an address from the Spam Reports list
Retrieve a list of statistics

parameters.Name: days
parameters.Description: Number of days in the past for which to retrieve statistics (Includes today). Must be an integer greater than 0

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start date of the range for which to retrieve statistics. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be before the end_date parameter

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end date of the range for which to retrieve statistics. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be after the start_date parameter

parameters.Name: aggregate
parameters.Description: Set to 1 to retrieve all-time totals including all subusers

parameters.Name: category
parameters.Description: The category or categories for which to retrieve stats. Multiple categories can be passed as follows: category[]=categoryA&category[]=categoryB.

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a list of all categories for your account

parameters.Name: list
parameters.Description: Flag indicating whether or not to retrieve category list

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve a list of unsubscribes, optionally with dates

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: Retrieve timestamp of the unsubscribe records in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

parameters.Name: days
parameters.Description: Number of days in the past for which to retrieve unsubscribes (includes today). Must be an integer greater than 0

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start date of the range for which to retrieve unsubscribes. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be before the end_date parameter

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end date of the range for which to retrieve unsubscribes. Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and be after the start_date parameter

parameters.Description: Operation to perfrom on the event notification URL

parameters.Name: user
parameters.Description: Name of the subuser. Must be registered under the account making the call.

parameters.Description: The URL for event noftifications. Required when task is 'set'

methods.Synopsis: Schedule a delivery time for an existing newsletter

parameters.Name: at
parameters.Description: Date/Time to deliver the newsletter. Must be provided in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS +-HH:MM)

parameters.Name: after
parameters.Description: Number of minutes in the future to schedule delivery, e.g. a value of 30 will schedule delivery 30 minutes after the request is received
